page.description: Moves focus to the previous control, as if the user pressed the "Shift-Tab" key.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.PREV() Syntax &ltOBJECT>.PREV() Description The &ltOBJECT>.PREV() method applies to:
Browses (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltBROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for &ltOBJECT> use either the &ltFORM> pointer or the name of the form) The &ltOBJECT>.PREV() method moves the focus to the previous control in the tab order as if the user had pressed the Shift Tab key. Limitations Desktop applications only. Example :customer.prev()
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
